attributes.action: I would like my local council to build a park on the green behind where i live.
attributes.background: Where i live there is not one park unless i walk down hill too a bus stop and catching a bus witch is difficult as me and my 2 children have a disability and struggle walking up and down there hill and catching a bus. My children are 2 and 3 it would be nice too take them too the park and play.
